author: doomburger
long_description:
Nodes: Cyan prismatic stone, Green prismatic stone, Pink prismatic stone. 
Craft items: Cyan coral dye, Green coral dye, Pink coral dye
Crafting Recipes: Prismatic stones: Appropriate coral dye surrounded by cobble makes 8 prismatic stone. Coral dye: appropriate rooted coral makes 9 coral dye
name: prismatic_stone
short_description: Adds decorative prismatic stone blocks, coral dyes, and six new crafting recipes.
title: Prismatic Stone
